txt.en:
Thank you for bringing me with you when you visited the village of Lhanuch with Corudan and Sigileth, my friend! I enjoyed hearing the account of your adventures with them before you came to Gondor!

I was struck by the words Nona spoke of her lost love Horn, and I am pleased that she liked the sketch I made for her to remember him by.

At her urging I made a copy of the drawing for you, as you were also their companion. I hope you will like it.

Caebar
